I have this cool T206 Dahlen Boston with a double name for sale.  Dahlen Boston is on the bottom and Wagner Boston is on the top.  It has a grade of SGC 2.  If interested, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  The price is $425 including shipping.  Thanks for looking, Bill
